text: 9.12 Sng 22.1-18, Ais 53.3, Dan 9.26, Mal 4.5, Luk 23.11, Plp 2.7 Agelak, Jisas agak, Nɨŋɨd apal agak. Buk Baybol ak ñu kɨl tɨkɨl agɨlak, Bɨ Yilayja ned apɨl, tap okok mɨdupsek gɨlɨtep gek, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne ak kɨdek ownɨgab agɨlak agak. Pen binɨb okok Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nop ma dɨl, yul awl ñɨnɨgabal ñu kɨl tɨkɨl agɨlak takaw ak, taynen anɨgɨl ñu kɨl tɨkɨl agɨlak agak?
